tier.item: 41) Narä r-ni-ä, na'c gun= lu juraar, nicla tej mood, nicla por xhaguibaa...
I hab-say-1s proh ib do = 2s swear nor a w ay nor by heaven
nicla por loj_guidexliuj ... nicla por guedx Jerusalén...
nor by earth nor by city Jeru salem
nor= also by ow n head= 2
`I say to you, do not swear by anything; neither by the earth...
nor by the heavens...nor by Jerusalem... nor by y our own head.'

52) ¿La di bej n gu-to' ti o'p m anbäz ni -ru-tajt por te centaab, ä?
q neg men com-sell two bird rel-hab-? for a cent q
